1.For this purpose Christ was revealed,
To destroy all the works of the evil one;
Christ in us has overcome,
So with gladness we sing
And welcome His Kingdom in.

Over sin He has conquered,
Hallelujah, He has conquered;
Over death victorious,
Hallelujah, victorious;
Over sickness He has triumphed,
Hallelujah, He has triumphed;
Jesus reigns over all!

2.In the name of Jesus we stand
By the power of His blood,
we now claim this ground;
Satan has no authority here,
Powers of darkness must flee
For Christ has the victory.

title: For unto us a child is
lyrics:
For unto us a Child is born,
Unto us a Son is given.
And the government shall be upon His shoulder,
And His Name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, the Mighty God,
The Everlasting Father
And the Prince of Peace is He.

title: Give me oil in my lamb
lyrics:
1.Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning---
Give me oil in my lamp, I pray;
Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning---
Keep me burning till the break of day

Sing Hosanna, sing Hosanna,
Sing Hosanna to the King of Kings;
Sing Hosanna, Sing Hosanna,
Sing Hosanna to the King.

2.Make me a fisher of men Keep me seeking,
Make me a fisher of men, I pray,
Make me a fisher of men, Keep me seeking,
Seeking souls till Jesus comes again.

title: Give thanks with a great
lyrics:
Give thanks with a grateful heart,
Give thanks to the Holy one,
Give thanks because He’s given Jesus Christ His Son
And now, let the  weak say,
“I am strong”
Let  the poor  say, “I am rich”
Because  of  what  the Lord  has done for us.
Give thanks.

title: Glory Jesus.glory
lyrics:
Glory Jesus, glory,
You do the fighting for me;
Praise you Jesus, praise you.
In you there’s always victory.
Ye are of  God’s  little children,
And have overcome him;
For greater is He that is in you,
Than he that is in the world.

title: Go tell in on the mountains
lyrics:
Go tell in on the mountains,
Over the hills and every where,
Go tell it on the mountains,
That Jesus Christ is born.

title: God can do anything
lyrics:
God can do anything, anything, anything,
God can do anything but fail.
He can save, He can keep,
He can cleanse, and He will,
God can do anything but fail.
He’s the Alpha and Omega,
The beginning and the end,
He’s the fairest of ten  thousand to my soul:
God can do anything, anything, anything,
God can do anything, but fail.

title: God forgave my sin in
lyrics:
1.God forgave my sin in Jesus’ Name,
I’ve been born again in Jesus’ Name;
And in Jesus’ Name I come to you,
To share His love as He told me to.

He said, ”Freely, freely you have received;
Freely freely give.
Go in My Name and because you believe,
Others will know that I live.”

2.All pow’r is given in Jesus’ Name,
In earth and heaven in Jesus’ Name;
And in Jesus’ Name I come to you,
To share His pow’r as He told me to.

title: God is good all the time
lyrics:
God is good all the time
He put a song of praise
In this heart of mine
God is good all the time,
Through the darkest night
His light will shine
God is good, God is good,
All the time

1.If you’re walking through the valley
There are shadows all around.
Do not fear He will guide you
He will keep you safe and sound
He has promised to never leave you
Nor forsake you, and His word is true.

2.We were sinners so unworthy,
Still for us He chose to die,
He filled us with His Holy spirit,
Now we can stand and testify,
That His love is everlasting,
And His mercies they will never end.

title: Go is so good
lyrics:
1.God is so good (3)
He’s so good to me

2.He answers prayers (3)
He’s so good to me

3.I love Him so (3)
He’s so good to me

title: God is still on the throne
lyrics:
God is still on the throne
And He will remember His own
Though trials may press us
And burdens distress us,
He  never will leave us alone.
God is still on the throne,
He never forsaketh His own;
His promise is true,
He will not forget you,
God is still on the throne

title: God will make a way
lyrics:
God will make a way
Where there seems to be no way
He works in ways we cannot see
He will make a way for me
He will be my guide
Hold me closely to His side
With love and strength
For each new day
He will make a way (2)

By a roadway in the wilderness He will lead me.
Rivers in the desert will I see
Heaven and earth will fade
But His Word will still remain
He will do something new today

title: Greater is He that is in me
lyrics:
Greater is He that is in me (3)
Than he that is in the world
Satan’s like a roaring lion
Roaming to and fro
Seeking whom he may devour
The Bible tells me so
Many souls have been deceived
To fall in some weak hour
But God has promised us today
His overcoming power.
Greater is He . . .

title: Hallelujah! I will sing
lyrics:
Hallelujah! I will sing all about it
Hallelujah! I will shout all about it
Hallelujah can’t live without it, praise God, praise God!
Now I’m living in a new creation
Now I’m drinking at the well of salvation,
Now there is no condemnation, praise God, praise God!

title: Happiness is to know the
lyrics:
1.Happiness is to know the saviour,
Living a life within His favour
Having a change in my behaviour-
Happiness is the Lord:

2.Happiness is a new creation-
“Jesus and me” in close relation,
Having a part in His salvation,
Happiness is the Lord:
Real joy is mine, no matter if tear drops start;
I’ve found the secret -it’s Jesus in my heart!

3.Happiness is to be forgiven,
Living a life that’s worth the living,
Taking a trip that leads to heaven---
Happiness is the Lord:
Happiness is the Lord, Happiness is the Lord!

title: He gave me beauty for
lyrics:
He gave me beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning
The garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness
That we might be trees of righteousness
The planting of the Lord, that He might   be glorified.

title: He is Lord, He is Lord
lyrics:
He is Lord, He is Lord
He is risen from the dead
And He is Lord
Every knee shall bow,
Every tongue shall confess
That Jesus Christ is Lord

title: He is my everything
lyrics:
He is my everything
He is my all
He is my everything
Both great and small
He gave himself for me
Made everything new
He is my everything
Now how about you.

title: He lives, He lives
lyrics:
He lives, He lives
Christ Jesus lives today
He walks with me and talks with me
Along life’s narrow way.
He lives, He lives, Salvation to impart!
You ask me how I know He lives
He lives within my heart.

title: He owns the cattle on
He shall feed his flock
lyrics:
He shall feed His flock like a shepherd,
He shall gather the lambs in His arms
And carry them in His bosom,
And shall gently lead those that are with young.

title: He that is in us is greater
lyrics:
He that is in us is greater than he
That is in the world
He that is in us is greater than he
That is in the world
Therefore I will sing and I will rejoice
For His Spirit lives in me
Christ the Living One has overcome
And we share in His victory

title: He'll go with me all the
lyrics:
He’ll go with me all the way,
He’s my comfort and my stay,
By His tender love and mercy,
I will never never stray.
O’er the mountains rough and steep,
Through the valleys dark and deep,
Till I reach my home in glory,
He’ll go with me all the way.

title: He's able, He's able
lyrics:
He’s able,He’s able, I know He’s able
I know my Lord is able to carry me thru.
He’s able He’s able, I know He’s able
I know my Lord is able to carry me thru.
He healed the broken-hearted and sets the captive free,
He made the lame to walk again and caused the blind to see.
He’s able. . .

title: He's still working on me
lyrics:
He’s still working on me
To make me what I ought to be ;
It took Him just a week to make the moon and stars
The Sun and the Earth and Jupiter and Mars,
How loving and patient He must be!
He’s still working on me!
In the mirror of His word, reflections that I see
Make me wonder why He never gave upon me!
But He loves me as I am and helps me when I pray;
Remember He’s the potter I’m the clay.

title: Heaven came down
lyrics:
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul;
When at the Cross my Saviour made me whole
My sins were washed away and my night was turned to day
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul.

title: His name is wornderful
lyrics:
His name is wonderful (3)
Jesus, my Lord---
He is the mighty King,
Master of everything,
His Name is wonderful, Jesus my Lord.
He’s the great Shepherd,
The Rock of all ages,
Almighty God is He
Bow down before Him
Love and adore Him,
His name is wonderful, Jesus my Lord.

title: Holy, Holy, Holy
lyrics:
1.Holy, Holy, Holy, Holy,  Holy, Holy
Lord God almighty!
And we lift our hearts before You
As a token of our love;
Holy, holy, holy, holy.

2.Gracious Father, gracious Father
We’re so blessed to be Your children, gracious Father
And we lift our hearts before
You as a token of our love:
Gracious Father, gracious Father.

3.Precious Jesus, precious Jesus
We’re so glad that You’ve redeemed us, precious Jesus;
And we lift our hands before You
As a token of our love,
Precious Jesus, precious Jesus.

title: Hosanna, Hosanna
lyrics:
1.Hosanna, Hosanna
Hosanna in the highest,

Lord we lift up Your name
With hearts full of Praise,
Be exalted O Lord our God
Hosanna in the Highest.

2.Glory, Glory, Glory to the King of kings.

3.Jesus, Jesus, Jesus is the King of kings.

title: How lovely on the mountains
lyrics:
How lovely on the mountains
Are the feet of Him
Who brings good news,good news.
Proclaiming peace announcing news of happiness,
Our God reigns. (6)

title: I am a debtor, Lord
lyrics:
I am a debtor, Lord,a debtor for life
Keep me from wasteful self and strife
B’cause of the Cross,O Lord, I owe you my all
My spirit’s moved by Your tender call.
You have brought me I know, With your precious Blood
Timeless Calvary’s pleading love has stood
How can I draw back
And not be wholly Thine
Love and serve,nor call anything mine.

title: I am the way, the Truth
lyrics:
I am the Way, the Truth and the Life
That’s what Jesus said (2)
Without the Way, there is no going,
Without the Truth, there is no knowing,
Without the Life, there is no living
I am the Way, the Truth and the Life,
That’s what Jesus said.

title: I can do everything
lyrics:
I can do everything, (can do)
Everything through Him,
(can do) everything through Him
Who gives me strength,
I can do, I can do.
I can do, everything (2)
Everything, everything, everything
Though Him who gives me strength.
I can do...

title: I cast all my cares upon
lyrics:
I cast all my cares upon You,
I lay all of my burdens,
Down at Your feet,
And any time I don’t know what to do
I will cast all my cares upon You.

title: I delight greatly in the
lyrics:
I delight greatly in the Lord,
My soul rejoices in my God (2)
For He has clothed me with  garments of salvation,
And arrayed me in a robe of righteousness.-2

title: I delight to do thy will
lyrics:
I delight to do Thy will, O Lord
I delight to do Thy will
And to walk with Thee is not grievous unto me,
For I delight to do Thy will.

title: I have decided to follow
lyrics:
I have decided to follow Jesus (3)
No turning back. (2)
The world behind me,
The Cross before me (3)
No turning back.

title: I have hidden your word
lyrics:
I have hidden Your Word in my heart
That I might not sin against You(2)
That I might not sin against You(2)
I have hidden . . .

title: I have tasted a freedom
lyrics:
1.I have tasted a freedom,
I can go where He’s leading,
The shackles can hold me no more.
I have learned of life’s essence
As I stand in His presence,
And sing with my heart, He is Lord.

Keep silent, ye mountains,
Ye fields and ye fountains,
For this is the time I must sing;
It’s the time to sing praises
To the Rock of the Ages,
And this is the time I must sing.

2.There are days filled with sorrow,
And plans for tomorrow,
But this is the time I must sing;
And I know there’s a reason
Why in His own season
God gives me a song I can sing.

title: I know a fount where
I love the thrill that I fell
lyrics:
I love the thrill that I feel when
I get together with,
God’s wonderful people;
Love the thrill that I feel
when I get together with,
God’s wonderful people;
What a sight just to see all the happy faces,
Praising God in heavenly places,
What a thrill that I feel when I get together with
God’s wonderful people.

title: I love you Lord, and lift
lyrics:
I love you Lord, and I lift my voice
To worship You,O my soul rejoice.
Take joy my King, in what You hear,
May it be a sweet, sweet sound in Your ear.

title: I own everything, simply
lyrics:
I owe everything, simply everything
I owe everything to my Lord.
I owe everything, every little thing
I owe everything to my Lord.

1.My Lord loved me first
He loved me long ago
Long before I knew of Him,
He had His eye on me,
Before I was born, He loved me then
And He loves me still.

2.I owe much to friends
Who’ve encouraged me
Helped and prayed for me on my way
Yet I know those friends
Are just one great part,
Of the everything from my Lord.

3.Help me share it out,
All you’ve given me
With the world that I live in
’Cause I can’t hold it all,
It’s too much for me
Help me share it out with my friends.

title: I took a plunge in the
lyrics:
I took a plunge in the crimson flood
That washes white as snow,
I took a drink at the Fountain head;
And it satisfies I know;
I took a look at the Christ of the cross,
And my burdens rolled away -
And I’m shouting singing “Praise the Lord!”
For the happy, happy day.

title: I want a river of life flowing
lyrics:
I want a river of life flowing out of me
That makes the lame to walk and the blind to see
Open prison doors, set the captive free
I want a river of life . . .
Spring up O well, within my soul
Spring up O well, and make me whole
Spring up O well, and give to me That life abundantly.

title: I want to be more than
lyrics:
I want to be more than a
Sunday go to meetin’ Christian
I want a religion that
Thrills me ev’ryday;
Sayin’ “Amen” to the preacher is fine,
If all the week I let my light shine;
I want to be more than a sunday go to meetin’ Christian.

title: I was sinking deep in sin
lyrics:
I was sinking deep in sin,
Far from the peaceful shore,
Very deeply stained within,
Sinking to rise no more;
But the Master of the sea
Heard my despairing cry,
From the waters lifted me
Now safe am I.

Love lifted me! Love lifted me!
When nothing else could help,
Love lifted me! (Repeat)

title: I was weary and tired
lyrics:
I was weary and tired with sins dark ways,
And helplessly lost I could see;
But with joy was amazed, as at Calv’ry I gazed,
There was grace enough left there for me.
I cried unto Jesus and bowed to His will
The joy of His spirit, my heart then did fill;
And wonder of wonders!
O sinner, ’tis true,
There is grace enough left there for you.

title: I will bless thee, O Lord
lyrics:
I will bless Thee, O Lord -2
With a heart of thanksgiving,
I will bless Thee, O Lord.
With my hands lifted up,
And my mouth filled with praise,
With a heart of thanksgiving,
I will bless Thee, O Lord.

title: I will call upon the Lord
lyrics:
I will call upon the Lord
Who is worthy to be praised
So shall I be saved
From mine enemies

The Lord liveth,
And blessed be my rock
And may the God of my salvation
Be exalted.   (Repeat)

title: I will enter his gates with
lyrics:
I will enter His gates with
thanksgiving in my heart,
I will enter His courts with praise.
I will say, “This is the day that the Lord has made,”
I  will rejoice for He has made me glad,
He has made me glad, (2)
I  will rejoice for He has made me glad. (Repeat last two lines)

title: I will make you fishers
lyrics:
I will make you fishers of men,
Fishers of men, fishers of men,
I will make you fishers of men,
If you follow Me,
If you follow Me,
If you follow Me,
I will make you fishers of men,
If you follow Me.

title: I will sing of the mercies
lyrics:
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever,
I will sing! I will sing!
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever,
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord.
With my mouth will I make known Thy faithfulness,Thy faithfulness.
With my mouth will I make known
Thy faithfulness to all generations.
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord forever
I will sing of the mercies of the Lord.

title: I will sing unto the Lord for
lyrics:
I will sing unto the Lord ,
For He has triumphed gloriously,
The horse and rider fell into the sea. (repeat)

1.The Lord is God and 
I will praise Him;
The Lord is God and 
I will exalt Him.  (repeat)

2.I will sing unto the Lord, for He has 
triumphed gloriously,
The grave is empty won’t you 
come and see.  (repeat)

title: I will sing unto the Lord as
lyrics:
I will sing unto the Lord as long as I live,
I will sing praise  to my  God while I have my being,
My meditation of Him shall be sweet
I will be glad, I will be glad in the Lord.
bless thou the Lord, Oh,my soul,Praise ye the Lord. (4)

title: I will worship
lyrics:
1.I will worship (I will worship)
With all of my heart.(with all of my heart)
I will praise You (I will praise You)
With all of my strength. (all my strength)
I will seek You (I will seek You)
All of my days. (all of my days)
I will follow (I will follow)
All of Your ways. (all Your ways)

I will give You all my worship,
I will give You all my praise.
You alone I long to worship,
You alone are worthy of my praise.

2.I will bow down, (I will bow down)
Hail You as king. (Hail You as King)
I will serve You (I will serve You)
Give You everything. (give You everything)
I will lift up (I will lift up)
My eyes to Your throne, (my eyes to Your throne)
I will trust You, (I will trust You)
I will trust You alone. (trust You alone)

title: I ll live for Jesus
lyrics:
I’ll live for Jesus, day after day
I’ll live for Jesus, let come what may
The Holy spirit I will obey
I’ll live for Jesus day after day.

title: I ll tell the world that I'm
lyrics:
1.I’ll tell the world that I’m a Christian
I’m not ashamed His name to bear;
I’ll tell the world that I’m a Christian-
I’ll take Him with me anywhere.
I’ll tell the world how Jesus saved me
And how He gave me a life brand new,
And I know that if you trust Him
That all He gave me He’ll give to you.
I’ll tell the world that He’s my Saviour
No other one could love me so;
My life, my all is His forever
And where He leads me I will go.

2.I’ll tell the world that He is coming
It may be near or far away;
But we must live as if His coming
Would be tomorrow or today,
For when He comes and life is over,
For those who love Him there’s more to be,
Eyes have never seen the wonders,
That He’s preparing for you and me,
O tell the world that you’re a Christian,
Be not ashamed His name to bear;
O tell the world that you’re a Christian,
And take Him with you ev’rywhere.

title: I m gonna set my mind
lyrics:
I’m gonna set my mind on things above
Set my mind on Your great love
I’m gonna think about
The things You told me to
Lord I’m gonna set my mind on You.
Things that are good, honest and true
All of the wonderful deeds You do
Things that are right and pure in Your sight
With all of my might
I’m gonna set My mind on You.

title: I m on the rock, Halleluiah
lyrics:
I’m on the rock, Hallelujah,
I’m on the rock to stay ! Hallelujah!
For He lifted me from the miry clay
I’m on the rock to stay!
I’m in the fold, Hallelujah!
I’m in the fold to stay, Hallelujah!
For He brought me back from the path astray
I’m in the fold to stay.

title: I m satisfied with just a
lyrics:
I’m satisfied with just a cottage below,
A little silver and a little gold:
But in that city where the
ransomed will shine,
I want a gold one that’s silver-lined.
I’ve got a mansion just over the hill top,
In that bright land where
we’ll never grow old;
And some day yonder
we’ll never more wander
But walk the streets that
are purest gold.

title: I ve been redeemed
lyrics:
I’ve been redeemed
by the Blood of the Lamb (3)
Saved and sanctified I am,
All my sins are washed away
I’ve been redeemed.

title: I ve gotta be like a tree
lyrics:
1.I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the Father to keep me strong
I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the name of the Lord.
I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the Father to help me grow
I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the name of the Lord.

The deeper the roots go, the better the fruits grow
The blessings bloom out for all to see
The deeper the roots go, the more my life shows
That Jesus is the Lord of me.
(Repeat chorus and verse)

2.I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the Father to keep me strong
I’ve gotta be like a tree planted by the water
Trusting in the name of the Lord.
Trusting in the name of the Lord.
Trusting in the name of the Lord.
Trusting in the name of the Lord.

title: I ve take my harp down
lyrics:
I’ve taken my harp down, from the willow tree
My heart is singing the victory
My past is forgiven, my home is in Heaven,
All sorrow is gone, the glory has come
And now I am free.

Thy loving-kindness is better than life (2)
My lips shall praise Thee
Thus will I bless Thee
Thy loving-kindness is better than life.

title: If any man come after me
lyrics:
If any man come after me,
Let him deny himself,
Pick up his cross and follow Me
Into Life eternally;
Deny yourself,  pick up the cross
And follow Jesus,
He is the Way, Truth and Life.

Alleluia, praise the Lord
Worship Him in one accord;
Alleluia, He is King,
Master, Lord of everything;
Jesus Christ, Lord of all,
Loving great and small,
He is the Way, Truth and Life.

title: If my people who bear
lyrics:
If my people who bear my name,
Will humble themselves and pray,
If they seek my presence and turn 
their backs on their wicked ways.
Then I will hear from heaven
I’ll hear from heaven and forgive;
I will forgive their sins
And will heal their land,
Yes, I will heal their land.

title: If we confess our sins
lyrics:
If we confess our sins,
He is faithful and just,
And will forgive us our sins And purify us (2)
From all unrighteousness.

title: If you love me
lyrics:
If you love me
keep my commandments
If you love me keep them true
If you love me keep my commandments
Not forgetting the old or new.

1.On the mountain Sinai,
God gave Moses ten great laws,
To be kept by His own people
Throughout time.
Then came Jesus on the scene,
With one new great law of love,
Knowing love would bring the best
From us, He said.

2.Now then Jesus could have said,
You must do this or do that,
But instead He left us choice to prove our love.
Though sometimes if we but could,
We would change the laws of God,
But the words of Jesus echo in our minds.

title: If you want joy,real joy
lyrics:
If you want joy, real joy, wonderful joy,
Let Jesus come into your heart.
If you want joy, real joy, wonderful joy
Let Jesus come into your heart.
Your sins He’ll wash away,
Your night He’ll turn today,
Your life He’ll make it over anew.
If you want joy, real joy, wonderful joy,
Let Jesus come into your heart.

title: If you want to be great
lyrics:
If you want to be great in God’s Kingdom,
Learn to be the servant of all (2)
Learn to be the servant of all (2)
(Repeat lines 1 & 2)

title: If you're saved and
lyrics:
If you're saved and you're glad about it,
Show it in your face (3)
If you're saved and you're glad about it,
Show it in your face (2)
Let the joy of salvation be a shining light,
That will lead souls to Jesus,
And to paths of right.
If you're saved and you're ....

title: If you've tried everything
lyrics:
1.If you’ve tried everything
And everything has failed;
Try Jesus (Repeat)

He’ll be your dearest friend,
Stay with you to the end,
So, if you’ve tried eveything and 
everything has failed, try Jesus.

2.If you need a helping hand,
Someone to understand;
Try Jesus (Repeat)
He’ll be your . . .

title: In each heart there is a
lyrics:
In each heart there is a longing
In each soul a desperate cry,
To know if life has some true meaning,
Or do we simply live and die;
Earthly pleasures, and possessions
Leave the sinking spirit dry
In each heart there is a longing
Only Jesus satisfies.
In each life there comes a question,
Is there more than meets the eye?
And do we see of the eternal
When the well of days runs dry;
So few searching, so few finding
The difference between truth and lies,
While in each heart there is a longing,
Only Jesus satisfies.

title: In heavenly armour wel'll
lyrics:
1.In heavenly armour we’ll enter the land
The battle belongs to the Lord.
No weapons that’s fashioned
against us shall stand,
The battle belongs to the Lord.

We sing glory and honour
Power and strength to the Lord.(2)

2.The power of darkness comes in like a flood,
The battle belongs to the Lord.
He’s raised up a standard the power of His blood,
The battle belongs to the Lord.

3.When your enemy presses in hard, do not fear;
The battle belongs to the Lord.
Take courage, my friend your redemption is near;
The battle belongs to the Lord.

title: In His time, In His time
lyrics:
1.In His time, In His time,
He makes all things beautiful in His time,
Lord, please show me every day,
As you’re teaching me your way,
That you do just what you say, in your time.

2.In your time, in your time,
You make all things beautiful, in your time.
Lord, my life to you I bring,
May each song I have to sing
Be to you a lovely thing, in your time.

title: In Jesus' Name, in Jesus
lyrics:
1.In Jesus’ Name, in Jesus’ Name,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name,
We’ll stake our claim for victory
In Jesus’ wonderful Name.
In Jesus’ Name, in Jesus’ Name
In Jesus’ wonderful Name,
We’ll take our stand, reclaim our land,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name.

In His Name, wonderful Name,
Powerful Name, We’ll claim the victory.  (Repeat)

2.In Jesus’ name, In Jesus’ Name,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name,
We’ll break the bonds that bind our friends,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name.
In Jesus’ Name, In Jesus’ Name,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name,
We won’t give in; we’ll fight to win,
In Jesus’ wonderful Name.

title: In my heart there rings a
lyrics:
In my heart there rings a melody,
There rings a melody ,
With heavenly harmony.
In my heart there rings a melody,
There rings a melody of love.
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,
Sweetest name I know,
Fills my every longing,
Keeps me singing as I go.

title: In the name of Jesus
lyrics:
In the Name of Jesus,
In the Name of Jesus,
We’ll have the victory, Hallelujah!
In the Name of Jesus,
In the Name of Jesus,
Demons will have to flee.
Who can tell what God can do
Who can tell of His love for you
In the Name of Jesus, Jesus
We’ll have the victory.

title: In the very thought of
lyrics:
1.In the very thought of Jesus
His presence can be found
He’s as close as the mention of His Name;
There is never any distance
Between my Lord and me
He’s as close as the mention of His Name

He’s as close as the mention of His name
Jesus, Jesus. (2)

2.In my hour of struggle so many times I’ve found,
He’s as close as the mention of His Name;
Just to breathe the name of Jesus
Will turn everything around,
He’s as close as the mention of His Name.

title: Into my heart! Into for
lyrics:
Into my heart! Into my heart!
Come into my heart Lord Jesus
Come in today, come in to stay.
Come into my heart Lord Jesus.

title: Is anything too hard for
lyrics:
Is anything too hard for the Lord! (2)
Is anything too hard! (2)
Is anything too hard for the Lord!
No nothing is too hard for the Lord (2)
No nothing is too hard (2)
No nothing is too hard for the Lord.

title: Isn't He beautiful
lyrics:
Isn’t He beautiful, beautiful, isn’t He!
Prince of peace, Son of God Isn’t He!
Isn’t He wonderful, wonderful isn’t He!
Counsellor, Almighty God,
Isn’t He! Isn’t He! Isn’t He!

title: Isn't He wonderful
lyrics:
Isn’t He wonderful, wonderful, wonderful,
Isn’t Jesus my Lord wonderful?
Eyes have seen, ears have heard
It’s recorded in His word,
Isn’t Jesus my Lord wonderful?

title: It is no secret, what God
lyrics:
It is no secret, what God can do;
What He’s done for others,
He’ll do for you.
With arms wide open,
He’ll pardon you
It is no secret what God can do.

title: It s not by might nor by
lyrics:
“It’s not by might nor by power
But by my Spirit”
“It’s not by might nor by power”,
Says the Lord.

title: It s  your Blood that
lyrics:
It’s Your Blood that cleanses me,
It’s Your Blood that gives me life,
It’s Your Blood that took my place,
In redeeming sacrifice,
Washes me whiter than the snow, than the snow;
My Jesus, God’s precious sacrifice.

title: Jehovah Jireh, God will
lyrics:
Jehovah Jireh, God will provide,
Jehovah Rophe, God heals;
Jehovah M’keddesh, God who sanctifies,
Jehovah Nissi, God is my banner.
Jehovah Rohi, God my Shepherd,
Jehovah Shalom, God is peace;
Jehovah Tsidkenu, God our righteousness,
Jehovah Shammah, God who is there.

title: Jehovah Jireh, myprovider
lyrics:
Jehovah Jireh, my Provider,
Your grace is sufficient
For me, for me, for me.
Jehovah Jireh, my Provider
Your grace is sufficient for me.
My Lord shall supply all my needs
According to His riches in glory;
He’ll give His angels charge over me,
Jehovah Jireh cares for me, for me, for me,
Jehovah Jireh cares for me.

title: Jesus is a wonderful
lyrics:
Jesus is a wonderful Saviour,
He will carry you thru;  (3)
Until the battle’s done and the 
victory is won my Lord will carry you thru;
O, my  precious brother, when the world’s on fire,
You’ll need my Jesus to be your Saviour;
He’ll hide you ever in the Rock of Ages,
In the Rock of Ages just cleft for you.

title: Jesus ia alive today
lyrics:
Jesus is Alive today (2)
Jesus is Alive, very much Alive,
Jesus is Alive Today.

1.He’s living in the hearts of
ordinary people,
Helping them to love both
God and man.
Giving them the faith to
look for miracles,
Helping them to know
they count in His plan.

2.He’s always doing
things He used to do;
Things like making people
clean and new.
Even though He’s got a
world to look after,
Still He has the time to
answer prayer too.

title: Jesus is the Alpha, Alpha
lyrics:
Jesus is the Alpha, Alpha Omega (2)
Like Him I want to be today and forever (2)
I will praise Him for He’s Alpha, Alpha Omega (2)

title: Jesus is the answer for
lyrics:
Jesus is the answer, for the world today;
Above Him there’s no other,
Jesus is the way.
If you have some questions in the corners of your mind,
Traces of discouragement and peace you cannot find,
Reflections of your past, seem to face you every day,
But, this one thing I do know,
Jesus is the way.

title: Jesus put this song into
lyrics:
1.Jesus put this song into our hearts,
Jesus put this song into our hearts,
It’s a song of joy no one can take away,
Jesus put this song, into our hearts.

2.Jesus taught us how to live in harmony,
Jesus taught us how to live in harmony,
Different faces, different races, He made us one,
Jesus taught us how to live in harmony.

3.Jesus taught us how to be a family,
Jesus taught us how to be a family,
Loving one another with the love that he gives,
Jesus taught us how to be, a family.

title: Jesus set me absolutely
lyrics:
Jesus set me absolutely free;
Died on Calvary, gave me liberty;
Jesus set me absolutely free,
Praise His Name.
And that’s enough to make me shout (twice)
For my sins are all forgiv’n and I’m on my way to heaven,
And that’s enough to make me shout.

title: Jesus set the music sing
lyrics:
Jesus set the music singing,
Jesus made the shadows part;
Jesus set the joy bells ringing,
Deep within my heart.
Now that my heart’s in tune,
I know that some day soon
I’ll join the angels in that
Heavenly chorus up above,
For Jesus set the music singing,
Jesus made the shadows part;
Jesus set the joy bells ringing,
Deep within my heart.

title: Jesus stand among us
Jesus use me, and please
lyrics:
Jesus use me, and please don’t refuse me
Surely there’s a work that I can do
Even tho’ it’s humble, help my will to crumble
Though the task be great, I’ll work for you.

1.Dear Lord, I’ll be your witness
If you’ll help my weakness,
I know that I’m not worthy, Lord, of Thee;
By eyes of faith I see Thee,
Upon the Cross of Calvary,
I cry, dear Lord, let me Thy servant be.

2.He’s the Lily of the valley,
He’s the Bright and Morning Star,
The Fairest of ten thousand to my soul;
He’s the beauiful Rose of Sharon,
He’s all the world to me,
I love Him and I want the world to know.

title: Jesus,Jesus you are the
lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus you are the Son of God,
Jesus, Jesus the precious Son of God,
Sweetest Rose of Sharon,
Come to set us free,
Jesus, Jesus you’re 	everything to me,
Yes you’re all the world to me.

title: Jesus, Jesus this is my
lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus, this is my song
Jesus, Jesus, the whole day long,
He is mine, a Saviour divine,
Praise His Holy Name.

1.All the way my Lord is leading me
Praise His Name! (2)
With His heav’nly manna feeding me
Praise His Holy Name.

2.When I faint, His grace upholdeth me
Praise His Name! (2)
When I fear, His arms enfoldeth me
Praise His Holy Name

title: Jesus, name above all
lyrics:
Jesus, Name above all names,
Beautiful Saviour, Glorious Lord,
Emmanuel, God is with us,
Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.

title: Joy is the flag flown high
lyrics:
Joy is the flag flown high from the castle of my heart,
From the castle of my heart, from the castle of my heart,
Joy is the flag flown high from the castle of my heart:
For the King is in residence there.
Let it fly in the sky, let the whole world know,
Let the whole world know, let whole world know,
Let it fly in the sky, let the whole world know,
That the King is in residence there.

title: King of Kings and
lyrics:
King of kings and Lord of lords,
Glory, Hallelujah.
Jesus, Prince of peace
Glory, Hallelujah.

title: Kingdoms may rise, King
lyrics:
Kingdoms may rise, kingdoms may fall,
Nations refuse to hear God’s call,
But the Word of the Lord endureth for evermore.
Things that we love last for a day
Then in the morning fade away
But the Word of the Lord endureth for evermore.
Take God at His promise, put your faith in Christ.
Trust Him for salvation and eternal life.
Things that we love . . .

title: know ye not, know ye not
lyrics:
Know ye not, know ye not
You are the temple (3)
You are the temple of the Holy Ghost.
Full of praise, full of power,
Full of Glory. (3)
I am the temple of the Holy Ghost.
Hallelu, Hallelu, Hallelujah . . .

title: Lead me to some soul
Let me be a living fire
lyrics:
Let me be a living fire
For your glory, King of kings;
Fill my soul with pure desire,
Ever while I live.
Help me choose unselfishly,
From this world I would be free,
For all its sin and vanity ---
Broke Your tender heart.
Let our hearts with motives clean
Give You joy and make us sing
In Your presence praise we bring
Ever while we live, ever while we live.

title: Let my light - shine in the
lyrics:
Let my light - shine in the night-time,
Let it shine - all day through;
Let it shine - shine for Jesus,
May it shine - shine on you!

title: Let no corrupt communication
lyrics:
1.Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth,
But only that which is good to help your brother out.
And be kind to one another, tender-hearted too;
Forgiving one another as God has forgiven you .

And grieve not the Holy Spirit, the Holy Spirit of God,
But be ye therefore as dear children, followers of God.

2.Let all bitterness, wrath and anger too,
Lies and evil speaking be put away from you,
Have no filthiness, foolish talk or pranks,
Which are not convenient but rather giving thanks.

title: Let the beauty of Jesus
lyrics:
Let the beauty of Jesus be seen in me,
All His wondrous compassion and purity,
Oh! Thou Spirit Divine,
All my nature refine,
Till the beauty of Jesus be seen in me.

title: Let there be love shared
Let's forget about our
lyrics:
1.Let’s forget about ourselves and magnify the Lord,
And worship Him. (3)
Worship Him, Jesus Christ our Lord.

2.Let’s forget about ourselves and magnify the Lord,
And praise His Name. (3)
Praise His Name, Jesus Christ our Lord.

3.Let’s forget about ourselves and magnify the Lord,
He’s coming soon. (3)
Coming soon, Jesus Christ our Lord.

title: Lift Him up! Lift Him up!
lyrics:
1.Lift Him up! lift Him up!
Lift the Name of Jesus higher
Lift Him up! raise his banner 	to the sky,
He said: “if I be lifted up,
I will draw men unto me,’’
Lift Him up! all ye people, lift Him up!

2.Praise the Lord! praise the Lord!
Praise His righteousness forever
Praise the Lord!
Lift your voices to the sky,
He said: “If we don’t praise His Name
Then the rocks and stones will cry out”,
Praise the Lord! all ye people,
Praise the Lord!

3.Show His love! show His love!
Show His love to everybody
Show His love! let your candle always shine,
He said: that “by the love we show,
They will know we’re His disciples”
Show His love! all ye people,
Show His love!

title: Lift up the Cross above
lyrics:
1.Lift up the Cross above the earth’s horizon;
The Cross...in every village, nation,
The Cross...lift up the Saviour Jesus
Jesus the Saviour of the world.

2.Lift up the Cross, glorious Cross of Jesus
The Cross...symbol of hope, forgiveness,
The Cross...life saving Cross of Jesus.
Jesus the Saviour of the world.

3.Lift up the Cross, where sin and death were conqured,
The Cross...where Jesus won the vict’ry,
The Cross...the empty Cross of Jesus,
Jesus, the Saviour of the world.

title: Light of the world
lyrics:
1.Light of the world
You stepped down into darkness
Opened my eyes let me see
Beauty that made
This heart adore You
Hope of a life spent with You

Here I am to worship
Here I am to bow down
Here I am to say that You’re my God.
You’re altogether lovely
Altogether worthy
Altogether wonderful to me.

2.King of all days
Oh so highly exalted 
Glorious in heaven above 
Humbly you came 
To the earth You created
All for love's sake became poor

I'll never know how much it cost
To see my sin upon that cross
Call upon the Name of the Lord
and be saved.(2)

title: Living for eternity how
lyrics:
1.Living for eternity how hard it seems
To souls bound by sin and compromise
Yet one true wave of love from my Saviour’s Cross
Switches gears for me, turns me around.

Oh! The love of the Cross
Ushering in the crucified life
My ugly self is buried;
Crucified forever
Life begins for me; as I live for eternity.

2.Things of the world and fleshly lusts
Distract no more,
No longer their lure deflects my soul;
Jesus’ love this matchless everlasting love
Burns into my heart eternal goals.

3.Eternity’s timelessness how awfully near,
Relentlessly cutting me to size;
Bone-chilling, unmasking all Earth’s vanities
Peace is mine while awaiting Etern’ty.

title: Livinig, He love me
Lord I come to you
lyrics:
1.Lord I come to You,
Let my heart be changed, renewed
Flowing from the grace,
That I found in You.
And Lord I’ve come to know, the 
weaknesses I see in me,
Will be stripped away,
By the power of Your love.

Hold me close,
Let Your love surround me
Bring me near, draw me to Your side
And as I wait
I’ll rise up like the eagle
And I will soar with You,
Your Spirit leads me on
In the power of Your love.

2.Lord, unveil my eyes,
Let me see You face to face,
The knowledge of Your love,
As You live in me.
Lord renew my mind,
As Your will unfolds in my life,
In living every day,
By the power of Your love.

title: Lord, I lift your name on
lyrics:
Lord, I lift Your Name on high
Lord, I love to sing Your praises
I’m so glad You’re in my life
I’m so glad You came to save us.

You came from Heaven to Earth
To show the way,
From the Earth to the Cross
My debts to pay,
From the Cross to the Grave,
From the Grave to the Sky,
Lord, I lift Your name on high.

title: Lord, may I come and
lyrics:
1.Lord, may I come and walk with Thee
How great an honour that will be;
Never to turn or to look behind
In step with Thee through all my life.

Then let the winds and the storms come,
I’ll feel your strength through all of them;
Please keep my heart just right with Thee
Then all will work out right for me.

2.My focus Lord all of my days,
Be on your Kingdom and Your ways;
Fashioned Your instrument to be
Humbly I’ll serve Lord please use me.

title: Lord, the hight of your love
lyrics:
1.Lord, the light of Your love is shining,
In the midst of the darkness, shining;
Jesus, Light of the world, shine upon us,
Set us free by the truth You now bring us,
Shine on me, shine on me.

Shine, Jesus, shine
Fill this land with the Father’s glory;
Blaze, Spirit, blaze
Set our hearts on fire;
Flow, river flow
Flood the nations with grace and mercy;
Send forth Your word,
Lord, and let there be light.

2.Lord, I come to Your awesome presence,
From the shadows into Your radiance;
By the blood I may enter Your brightness,
Search me, try me, comsume all my darkness,
Shine on me, shine on me.

3.As we gaze, on Your kingly brightness,
So our faces display Your likeness.
Ever changing from glory to glory,
Mirrored here may our lives tell Your story,
Shine on me, shine on me.

title: Lord, you're beautiful
lyrics:
1.Lord, You’re beautiful
Your face is all I see,
And when Your eyes are upon this child
Your grace abounds to me.

2.Lord, please light the fire
That once burnt bright and clear,
Replace the lamp of my first love
That burns with Holy fear.

title: Lord, help me to please
lyrics:
Lord, help me to please Thee throughout every day,
In all that I do and in all that I say
That filled with Thy spirit,
Each moment may be
A blessing to others and pleasing to Thee.

title: Love the Lord your God
lyrics:
Love the Lord your God, with all your heart,
And all your soul and all your mind
And love all of mankind
As you would love yourself and
Love, the Lord Your God with all your heart
And all your soul as you would love yourself and
We’ve got, Christian lives to live
We’ve got, Jesus’ love to give
We’ve got nothing to hide,
Because in Him we abide.

title: Majesty, worship his
lyrics:
Majesty, Worship His Majesty!
Unto Jesus be all glory, power and praise!
Majesty, Kingdom authority
Flow from His Throne, unto His own, His anthem raise!
So exalt, lift up on high the Name of Jesus,
Magnify, come glorify
Christ Jesus the King!
Majesty, Worship His Majesty!
Jesus who died, now glorified,
King of all kings!

title: Make me a channel of
Make my life to be
lyrics:
Make my life to be,
Like a melody,
Ever sounding out the message of the cross;
Saviour let me be,
Like a melody,
Ever sounding out in days of gain or loss.
With Jesus in my heart, no discord can arise,
He can make the saddest heart to harmonize.
Saviour, let me be,
Like a melody,
Ever sounding out the message of the Cross.

title: Make way, Make way
lyrics:
1.Make way, make way,
For Christ the King
In splendour arrives
Fling wide the gates and welcome Him
Into your lives.

Make way! make way!
For King of kings! (2)
Make way! make way!
And let His Kingdom in!

2.He comes the broken hearts to heal
The prisoners to free,
The deaf shall hear
The lame shall dance, the blind shall see.

3.And those who mourn with heavy hearts,
Who weep and sigh;
With laughter, joy and royal crown
He’ll beautify!

4.We call you now to worship Him
As Lord of all,
To have no gods before Him
Their thrones must fall!

title: Mighty in vict'ry
lyrics:
Mighty in vict’ry
Glorious in majesty
Every eye shall see Him---
When He appears
Coming in the clouds with
power and glory
Hail to the King!
We must be ready ---
watching and praying
Serving each other ---
building His Kingdom
Then every knee shall bow,
Then every tongue confess,
Jesus is Lord!

title: And I will worship you
lyrics:
1.And I will worship You with all of my heart,
And I will worship You with all of my mind,
And I will worship You with all of my strength,
For Your are my Lord! You are my God.

More love, more power,
More of You in my life,
More love, more power,
More of You in my life.

2.And I will seek Your face with all of my heart,
And I will seek Your face with all of my mind,
And I will seek Your face with all of my strength,
For You are my Lord! You are my God.

title: Mountains of mercies
lyrics:
Mountains of mercies,
Fountains of grace,
These are the bounties,
Uplifting my soul
Treasures so awesome in Jesus I find
Cheap pleasures so fleeting
I firmly forsake.
Can I leave Jesus for rubbish so vile?
My Saviour’s so precious,
I shall not grieve Him
Till life’s trials are over,
I’ll always be true
Jesus my treasure
The world’s so much junk.

title: My Bible, my Bible and I
lyrics:
1.My Bible, my Bible and I  (2)
What a wonderful treasure God gave without measure
We are travelling together, My Bible and I.

2.My Jesus, my Jesus and I (2)
What a wonderfulSaviour God gave without measure
We are travelling together, My Jesus and I.

3.His Spirit, His Spirit and I (2)
What a wonderful comfort God gave without measure
We are travelling together, His Spirit and I.

title: My glory and the lifter of
lyrics:
My glory and the lifter of my head  (2)
For Thou, O Lord, art a Shield to me
My glory and lifter of my head.
I cried unto the Lord with My voice (3)
And He heard me out of His Holy hill.
My glory and . . .

title: My God can do anything
lyrics:
My God can do anything, anything, yes, anything
My God can do anything, yes, anything,
He made the earth with all its fulness,
And all that time shall bring
My God can do anything, yes anything.
My God controls the wind and weather,
He sends the sunshine and the rain,
He holds this universe together,
With love He rules His great domain;
He understands each little heartache,
He even knows the pain you bear,
And He will get ne’er too busy
To give an answer to your prayer.

title: My Jesus My Saviour
lyrics:
My Jesus, My Saviour
Lord there is none like You
All of my days I want to praise the 
wonders of Your mighty love
My comfort, my shelter tower of 
refuge and strength
Let every breath all that I am never
cease to worship You.
Shout to the Lord, all the earth let us sing
Power and Majesty praise to the King
Mountains bow down and the seas will roar
At the sound of Your Name.
I sing for joy at the work of Your hands,
Forever I’ll love You forever I’ll stand,
Nothing compares to the promise I have in You.

title: My life is in you Lord
lyrics:
My life is in You Lord
My strength is in You Lord
My hope is in You Lord
In You, it’s in You  (twice)
I’ll praise You with all of my life,
I’ll praise You with all of my strength,
With all of my heart, with all of my strength,
All of my hope is in You.

title: My times are in his hands
lyrics:
My times are in His hands (4)
All things are working for good  (3)
My times are in His hands.

title: Never say another day
lyrics:
Never say another day
Will do for Jesus,
Come to Him,
Confess your sin,
He will not cast you out
Never say another day
Will do for Him.

title: Nobody else could've changed
lyrics:
1.Nobody else could’ve changed my heart,
Nobody else could’ve saved me.
Picked up the pieces when I fell apart,
I’m so glad You unchained me.

You are the one that I love
Light of the world sent from above,
Sing hallelujah! shout to the Lord,
You are the one,  (3)
You are the one I love.

2.If I knew the song that the angels sing,
We’d be singing together.
I can’t wait for eternity,
Praising Your name forever.

title: Not by chance I'm standing
lyrics:
1.Not by chance I’m standing here; God created me (2)

I am with You every day(3)
saith Jesus Christ.

2.From all sins which oppressed me, He did set me free. (2)

3.Nowhere in this world I find, such a blessed hope. (2)

4.Therefore with these songs of joy, I show forth His praise. (2)

title: Now unto Him who is able
lyrics:
Now unto Him who is able to keep,
Able to keep you from falling
And present you faultless
Before the presence of His glory
With exceeding joy
To the only wise God our Saviour
Be glory and Majesty
Dominion and power
Both now and forever, Amen.

title: Now unto the King eternal
lyrics:
Now unto the King eternal,
Unto the King immortal,
Unto the King invisible,
The only wise God,
The only wise God. (Repeat)
Unto the King be glory and honour,
Unto the King forever,
Unto the King be glory and honour
Forever and ever, Amen, Amen.

title: O I love to hear His voice
lyrics:
O I love to hear His voice,
Saying,”You belong to Me.
You are not your own,
With a price you’re bought
And you’re mine eternally”.
And I love to hear Him say,
“I have saved you by My grace.”
And when I get to glory
It will then be grander still;
For I shall see His face.

title: O it is wonderful to be a
lyrics:
O it is wonderful to be a Christian,
O it is wonderful to be God’s child!
O it is wonderful to have your sins forgiven,
O it is wonderful to be redeemed,
Justified forever reconciled!

title: O it's amazing what praising
lyrics:
O it’s amazing what praising can do
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
O it’s amazing what praising can do, Hallelujah!
I don’t worry when things go wrong
Jesus fills my heart with a song
Oh it’s amazing what praising can do, Hallelujah!

title: O Lord, do a work in me
lyrics:
O Lord, do a work in me
Take all my sin and iniquity
O Lord, do a mighty  work in me
I want to be holy, pure and holy
To be like Thee.
Take it up, take it out
Every fear and every doubt
I want to be full of Your power and love.

title: O lord, you've done great things
O Lord, our Lord, how majestic
lyrics:
1.O Lord,our Lord, how majestic
Thy Name is
How great is
Thy Name in all the earth,
Who has set Thy glory
Above the high heavens
And stilleth Thy foes through a child in it’s birth.

2.When I think on Thy heavens the work of Thy fingers
The moon and the stars which Thou has ordained
What is man in Thy mem’ry a man that Thou mindest
The son of man
That Thou carest for him?

3.Thou hast made him but little lower than angels,
And crowned him with
honour and glory
Thou gavest dominion o’er
all of the wide earth
And all of the creatures that
run in the sea.

title: O sing unto the Lord a new song
lyrics:
O sing unto the Lord a new song
For He has done marvellous things
His right hand and His holy arm hath gotten Him the victory.
The Lord has made known His salvation
His righteousness has
He openly showed,in the sight of the heathen:
O sing unto the Lord a new song
He has remembered His mercy and His truth to all the house of Israel.
All the ends of the earth hath seen, the salvation of our God.

title: Oh the joy of the Lord is in me
lyrics:
1.Oh the joy of the Lord is in me
Oh what happiness He brings
While I’m walking where He leads me
That’s why you often hear me sing.

Bless the Name of Jesus
Praise the Name of Jesus
Sing unto the King of Israel (2)
And we sing glory, glory, glory to His name forever,
Glory, glory, glory to His name.

2.Oh let’s worship Him in the Spirit
Oh no matter who you are
He has done such mighty wonders
That’s why this music stirs my heart.

title: Oh, the King is coming
lyrics:
Oh, the King is coming
The King is coming
I just heard the trumpet sounding
And now His face I see
Oh the King is coming
The king is coming praise God
He’s coming for me.

title: On the vict'ry side
lyrics:
On the vict’ry side, (2)
No foe can daunt me,
No fear can haunt me,
On the vict’ry side (3)
With Christ within, the fight we’ll win,
On the vict’ry side.

title: One way God said to get to
lyrics:
One way God said to get to heaven,
Jesus is the only way;
One way to reach those pearly mansions,
Jesus is the only way.
No other way, No other way
No other way to God.
One way God said to get to heaven,
Jesus is the only way.

title: Only to be what He wants me
lyrics:
Only to be  what He wants me to be,
Ev’ry  moment of ev’ry day;
Yielded completely to Jesus alone,
Ev’ry step of this pilgrim way.
Just to be clay in the potter’s hands,
Ready to do what His word commands.
(Repeat lines 1 & 2)

title: Open thou mine eyes
lyrics:
Open Thou mIne eyes,
That I may behold
Wondrous,wondrous things
Out of Thy law.

title: Over and over Like a mighty
lyrics:
Over and over,
Like a mighty sea ,
Comes the love of Jesus,
Rolling over me.
Over the sea, over the sea,
Jesus, Saviour, pilot me;
Over the sea, over the sea,
Over the Jasper sea.

title: Perfect in purity peerless
lyrics:
1.Perfect in purity
Peerless in Thy love
Boundless in compassion
My Jesus, how precious Thou art!

2.Thro’ all time and Ages
There is none like Thee,
My fainting soul to save
To give me peace never ceasing.

3.Jesus Lord most precious
At Thy Feet I fall
Fashion me to be
Perfect and pure, like unto Thee.

title: Praise and glory wisdom
lyrics:
Praise and glory
Wisdom and thanks
Honour, power and strength
Be to our God forever and ever.
Amen.

title: Praise him on the trumpet
lyrics:
Praise Him on the trumpet, the psaltery and harp,
Praise Him on the timbrel and the dance,
Praise Him with stringed instruments too.
Praise him on the loud cymbals,
Praise him on the loud cymbals,
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord.
Hallelujah, praise the Lord,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord,
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord!
Hallelujah, praise the Lord,
Hallelujah, praise the Lord,
Let everything that has breath praise the Lord!

title: Purify my heart let me be
lyrics:
1.Purify my heart
Let me be as gold and precious silver
Purify my heart
Let me be as gold, pure gold

Refiner’s fire, my hearts one desire
Is to be holy, set apart for You Lord
I choose to be holy, set apart for You my Master
Ready to do Your will.

2.Purify my heart
Cleanse me from within
And make me holy
Purify my heart
Cleanse me from my sin, deep within.

title: Put your trust in the love of
lyrics:
Put your trust in the love of Christ and sing, sing, sing,
Put your trust in the love of Christ and sing, sing, sing,
Turn your old frown upside down and sing, sing, sing,
Put your hand in the hand of Christ and you’ll sing, sing, sing.

title: Rejoice evermore, for this is
lyrics:
Rejoice evermore, for this is the will of God (3)
In Christ Jesus, concerning you.
Pray without ceasing, for this is the will of God (3)
In Christ Jesus, concerning you.
In ev’rything give thanks, for this is the will of God (3)
In Christ Jesus, concerning you.

title: Rejoice for the steps
lyrics:
Rejoice for the steps
Of the righteous man
They are ordered by God. (2)
In the time of trouble
God will uphold you
God will preserve you
God will sustain you
In the time of trouble God will lift you up
So rejoice your steps are ordered by God.

title: Rejoice in the Lord always
lyrics:
Rejoice in the Lord always, and again I say rejoice,
Rejoice in the Lord always, and again I say rejoice,
Rejoice, rejoice and again I say rejoice,
Rejoice, rejoice and again I say rejoice.

title: Righteousness, peace, joy in the
lyrics:
1.Righteousness, peace, joy in the Holy Ghost; (2)
That’s the Kingdom of God (Repeat)
Don’t you want to be a part of the kingdom, (3)
Come on, everybody!     (Repeat)

2.There’s love in the kingdom,
So much love in the kingdom;
There’s love in the kingdom,
Come on everybody.

3.There’s peace in the kingdom,
So much peace in the kingdom;
There’s peace in the kingdom,
Come on everybody.

4.There’s joy in the kingdom,
So much joy in the kingdom;
There’s joy in the kingdom,
Come on everybody.

5.I’m an heir to the kingdom,
I’m heir to the kingdom;
I’m an heir to the kingdom,
Come on everybody.
Yeah!

title: Salvation belongs to our God
lyrics:
1.Salvation belongs to our God
Who sits upon the Throne
And unto the Lamb.

Praise and glory, wisdom and thanks.
Honour and power and strength
Be to our God, forever and ever (3)
Amen.

2.And we the redeemed shall be strong
In purpose and unity, declaring aloud.

title: Scatter the last remain of
lyrics:
Scatter the last remains of sin,
And seal me Thine abode;
O make me glorious all within
A temple built by God!

title: Search me, O God
lyrics:
Search me, O God,
And know my heart today,;
Try me, O Saviour,
Know my thoughts, I pray ---
See if there be ---
Some wicked way in me ---
Cleanse me from every sin and set me free.
Lord, take my life ---
And make it wholly Thine;
Fill my poor heart with
Thy great love divine:
Take all my will,
My passion and my pride; ---
I now surrender: Lord, in me abide.

title: Seek ye first the Kingdom of
lyrics:
1.Seek ye first the Kingdom of God, And His righteousness,
And all these things shall be added unto you
Hallelu, Hallelujah.

Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah
Hallelu, Hallelujah.

2.Men shall not live by bread alone, But by every word
That proceeds from the mouth of God
Hallelu, Hallelujah.

3.Ask, and it shall be given unto you, Seek and you shall find;
Knock and it shall be opened unto you
Hallelu, Hallelujah.

title: Silver and gold have I none
lyrics:
’Silver and gold have I none;
But such as I have give I thee:
In the Name of Jesus Christ
Of Nazareth rise up and walk.’
(He went) walking and leaping and praising God (twice).
In the Name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk.

title: Sing with me hallelujahs
lyrics:
Sing with me hallelujahs,
Sing with me a song of praise;
For in thanking there is blessing,
Let us sing our grateful praise.

1.For the rest during the night,
For the sunshine full and bright
For the air that we can breathe so freely.

2.For the change He wrought in us
Through the wonder of the Cross
When He died that we may ever live.

3.From the dead He rose again
Satan’s forces having slain
That we all may live in victory.

title: Somewhere beyond the blue
lyrics:
Somewhere beyond the blue, 	there’s a mansion for me,
Somewhere beyond the blue
I am longing to be;
I’ll see my Saviour’s face
And sing of saving grace,
Somewhere beyond the blue, someday.

title: Spirit of the living God
lyrics:
Spirit of the Living God, fall afresh on me;
Spirit of the Living God, fall afresh on me.
Break me! Melt me! Mould me! Fill me!
Spirit of the Living God, fall afresh on me.

title: Sweep over my soul
lyrics:
1.Sweep over my soul,
Sweep over my soul,
Come gracious Spirit,
Sweep over my soul

2.I open my heart
Come and dwell In me
Oh ! May I be Thine lord
Sweep over my soul.

title: Take our love, Lord, make it
lyrics:
Take our love, Lord, make it Your love,
Take our life, Lord, make it Your life,
Take our home, Lord, make it Your home,
Take it all, Lord, make it Yours.

title: Teach me, aLord, to wait
lyrics:
1.Teach me, Lord, to wait
down on my knees
’Til in your own good time
you answer my pleas.
Teach me not to rely on
what others do,
But to wait in prayer for an
answer from you.

“They that wait upon the
Lord shall renew their strength;
They shall mount up with wings as eagles;
They shall run and not be weary;
They shall walk and not faint.”
Teach me Lord, Teach me Lord, to wait.

2.Teach me, Lord, to wait
while hearts are aflame,
Let me humble my pride,
and call on your name.
Keep my faith renewed, my
eyes on Thee,
Let me be on this earth,
what you want me to be.

title: Teenager, are you lonely
lyrics:
Teenager, are you lonely?
Do you need a friend?
Take Jesus as your Saviour,
He will be with you to the end;
He'll be your Guide,
Stay by your side,
Teenager, take Jesus to-day

title: Thank you for the cross Lord
lyrics:
Thank you for the cross, Lord
Thank you for the price You paid
Bearing all my sin and shame
In love You came
And gave amazing grace
Thank you for this love, Lord
Thank you for the nail pierced hands
Washed me in Your cleansing flow
Now all I know
Your forgiveness and embrace

Worthy is the Lamb
Seated on the throne
Crown You now with many crowns
You reign victorious
High and lifted up
Jesus Son of God
The Darling of Heaven crucified
Worthy is the Lamb
Worthy is the Lamb. (2)

title: Thank you, Lord Jesus
lyrics:
Thank you, Lord Jesus,
That I can freely speak
With you, my God
Thank you, Lord Jesus,
My prayer is heard by you.

1.All my griefs and all my sorrows,
All my worries, all my fears,
All my pain and all my conflicts,
Lord, I bring with tears.

2.Every joy and every blessing
Lord, I bring to you in prayer;
Through your faithfulness alone
I see this loving care.

3.I can bring you all the problems
I could tell nobody else
For dear Lord, you understand me,
You’re my closest friend

title: Thanks be to God, who gives
lyrics:
Thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus Christ our Lord. (repeat)

1.For He won the battle over death and evil,
Yes, He did, We know He did.
He can still deliver in the day of trouble,
Yes, He can,
We know He can.

2.Since our future victory is guaranteed,
Be strong and steady, very steady.
Do continue to abound in all God’s work,
For nothing’s wasted, nothing’s wasted.

title: The B - I - B - L - E
lyrics:
The B - I - B - L - E
Yes that’s the Book for me
I stand alone on the  word of God
The B - I - B - L - E.

title: The birds upon the tree tops
lyrics:
The birds upon the tree tops sing their song,
The angels chant the chorus all day long;
The flowers in the garden blend their hues
So why shouldn’t I,
Why shouldn’t you, praise Him too?

title: The earth is the Lord's and
lyrics:
The earth is the Lord’s and everything in it,
The earth is the Lord’s, the work of His hands
The earth is the Lord’s and everything in it
And all things were made for His glory
The mountains are His, the seas and the islands,
The cities and towns, the houses and streets,
Let rebels bow down and worship before Him,
For all things were made for His glory.
The earth is the Lord’s and everything in it for
All things were made, yes all things were made
And all things were made for His glory.

title: The grand old book
lyrics:
The grand old Book, the grand old Book,
You’ll find the words of comfort wherever you may look
In sorrow or in pain,
His promises are plain,
So keep on believing in the grand old Book.

title: The joy of the Lord is my
lyrics:
The joy of the Lord is my strength! (4)

1.The word of God is nigh thee even in thy mouth (3)

2.He gives me living water till I thirst no more (3)

3.He fills my mouth with laughter, Ha, Ha, Ha, Ha, Ha (3)

title: The law of the Lord is perfect
lyrics:
1.The law of the Lord is perfect
Converting the soul;
The testimony of the Lord is sure,
Making wise the simple.

More to be desired are they than gold
Yea, than much fine gold
Sweeter also than the honey
In the honeycomb.
Moreover by them is Thy servant warned
And in keeping of them there is great reward (2)

2.The statutes of the Lord are right,
Rejoicing the heart,
The commandments of the Lord are pure
Enlightening the eyes.

3.The fear of the Lord is clean
Enduring forever,
The judgments of the Lord are true,
And righteous altogether.

title: The Lord liveth; and blessed
lyrics:
The Lord liveth; and blessed be my Rock;
and may the God of my Salvation be exalted (twice)
Therefore will I give thanks unto Thee O Lord,
Among the nations,
And sing praises to Thy name.
The Lord liveth; and blessed be my rock;
And may the God of my Salvation be exalted.

title: The Lord thy God in the midst
lyrics:
The Lord thy God in the midst of thee is mighty, is mighty,
He will save, He will rejoice over thee with joy ,with joy,
He will rest in His love
He will joy over thee with singing
The Lord thy God in the midst
Of thee is mighty, is mighty, is mighty.

title: There are two ways built for you
lyrics:
1.There are two ways built for you and me,
That’s the Bible story,
The broad way is with danger filled,
The straight one leads to Glory.

(So then) Which way are you travelling? (3)
The broad or narrow way.

2.Oh, ’tis sweet to know that day by day
Jesus walks beside me;
With my hand in His I cannot stray
And safely He will guide me.

title: There has never been a friend
lyrics:
1.There has never been a friend like Jesus,
I have never found a friend so true;
When I weaken and my steps grow wayward,
Then He comes to me with strength anew.

We walk hand in hand through this pilgrim land¬
Here we linger for a day;
But soon we’ll leave this land of night
For that land so bright— There my friend and I will stay.

2.Let me recommend this friend so faithful
He will understand your deepest need;
For He walked this lonely path before us,
And He’s able ev’ry step to lead.

title: There is a name I love to hear
lyrics:
1.There is a name I love to hear;
I love to sing its worth;
It sounds like music in my ear,
The sweetest name on earth.

Oh, how I love Jesus, (3)
Because He first loved me!

2.Oh, for a thousand tongues to sing
My great Redeemer’s praise!
The glories of my God and King,
The triumphs of His Grace.

title: There is a redeemer
lyrics:
1.There is a Redeemer,
Jesus, God’s own Son,
Precious Lamb of God,
Messiah, Holy One.

Thank you O my Father, for giving us Your Son
And leaving Your Spirit, till The work on earth is done.

2.Jesus my Redeemer,
Name above all names,
Precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
O for sinners slain.

3.When I stand in glory,
I will see his face,
And there I’ll serve my King forever
In that Holy place.

title: There is no one too good
lyrics:
1.There is no one too good,
There is no one too vile,
There is no one too great or too small;
There is no one too wise, And no one too dull,
His love reaches out to all.

He has a welcome for all,
For all those who seek,
Guilt He removes,
And He gives us His love ---
This He promised to the meek.

2.One starts early to seek, And another starts late
To make use of the offer of God;
There are some who wait till locked is the gate
Do not wait, O heed to the Lord.

title: There is power in the name of
lyrics:
1.There is power in the name of Jesus;
We believe in His name.
We have called on the name of Jesus;
We are saved! We are saved!
At His name the demons flee.
At His name captives are freed;
For there is no other name that is higher, Than Jesus!

2.There is power in the name of Jesus,
Like a sword in our hands.
We declare in the name of Jesus,
We shall stand! We shall stand!
At His name God’s enemies;
Shall be crushed beneath our feet,
For there is no other name that is higher, than Jesus.

title: There is victory for me
lyrics:
There is victory for me,
There is victory for me,
Through the blood of Christ, my Saviour,
There is victory for me.
For me, yes me, for me, yes me,
Through the blood of Christ my Saviour, there is victory.

title: There's no greater name than
lyrics:
There’s no greater name than Jesus,
Name of Him who came to save us,
In that saving Name of Jesus 	
ev’ry knee shall bow.
Let ev’rything that is ‘neath the ground,
Let ev’rything in the world around,
Let ev’rything that is high o’er the sky,
Bow at Jesus Name---
In our minds by faith professing,
In our hearts by inward blessing,
On our tongues by word confessing,
Jesus Christ is Lord!

title: Therefore the redeemed of the
lyrics:
Therefore the redeemed of the Lord shall return
And come with singing unto Zion,
And everlasting joy shall be upon their head.
Therefore ......
They shall obtain gladness and joy
And sorrow and mourning shall flee away.
Therefore…..

title: Theare's just something about
lyrics:
There’s just something about my Jesus,
Something that I can’t explain,
For since I met this blessed  Saviour
My life has been so re-arranged:
Well, if you’re looking for friendship,
Contentment and peace
Just try Him and you will see—
There’s something about my Jesus,
Something about my Lord.

title: There's no other one so real
lyrics:
1.There’s no other one so real to me as Jesus,
No one to whom I’d rather go;
There’s no other one so real to me as Jesus,
No other one can love me so.

He takes away the fear,
When days are dark and drear,
He gives the peace of God above;
There’s no other one so real to  me as Jesus,
No other one can love me so.

2.When I’m sad and feeling blue I come to Jesus,
He loves me when the teardrops start,
There’s no other one so real to me as Jesus,
He lifts the burden from my heart.

title: These are the days of Elijah
lyrics:
1.These are the days of Elijah
Declaring the Word of the Lord
And these are the days of Your servant Moses’,
Righteousness being restored
And though these are days of great trials
Of famine and darkness and sword
Still we are the voice in the desert crying
Prepare ye the way of the Lord.

Behold He comes riding on the clouds
Shining like the sun at the trumpet call
So lift your voice it’s the year of Jubilee
And out of Zion’s hill salvation comes

2.And these are the days of Ezekiel
The dry bones becoming as flesh
And these are the days of your servant David
Rebuilding the temple of praise
And these are the days of the harvest
The fields are white in the world
And we are Your labourers in Your vineyard
Declaring the Word of the Lord.

title: Things are different now
lyrics:
Things are different now,
Something happened to me,
When I gave my heart to Jesus.
Things are different now,
I was changed, it must be,
When I gave my heart to Him.
Things I loved before have passed away,
Things I love far more have come to stay.
Things are different now,
Something happened to me,
When I gave my heart to Jesus.

title: This is the day that the
lyrics:
This is the day (2)
That the Lord has made (2)
We will rejoice, we will rejoice
And be glad in it (2)
This is the day that the
Lord has made
We will rejoice and be glad in it;
This is the day (2)
That the Lord has made.

title: Thou wilt keep him in perfect
lyrics:
1.Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace (3)
Whose mind is stayed on Thee

2.They that wait upon the Lord (3)
They shall renew their strength

3.Whom shall I send and who will go (3)
Here am I Lord, send me

4.If the son shall make you free (3)
Ye shall be free indeed.

title: Though the fig tree does not
lyrics:
Though the fig tree does not blossom
And there be no fruit on the vines;
The produce of the olive fails
And the fields yield no food,
Tho’  the flock be cut off from the fold
And there be no herd in the stalls,
Yet will I rejoice in the Lord
Yet will I rejoice in the Lord
I will joy in the God of my salvation
God the Lord is my strength.

title: Though my disappointments
lyrics:
1.Through my disappointments, strife and discontentment,
I cast my ev’ry care on the Lord,
No matter what obsession,
Pain or deep depression,
I’m standing on the Solid Rock.

I’m standing on the Rock of Ages
Safe from all the storm that rages,
Rich, but not from satan’s wages,
I’m standing on the Solid Rock.

2.Even though He’s gone now,
I don’t feel alone now,
With comfort came the Spirit of the Lord,
Now with His Word to guide me, from temptations hide me,
I’m standing on the Solid Rock.

3.Now I’m pressing onward, each step leads me homeward,
I’m trusting in my Saviour day by day,
And close is our relation, firm is its foundation,
So on this Solid Rock I’ll stay.

title: Thy loving kindness is better
lyrics:
Thy loving kindness is better than life,
Thy loving kindness is better than life,
My lips shall praise Thee
Thus will I bless Thee,
Thy loving kindness is better than life.

I lift my hands up unto Thy name
I lift my hands up unto Thy name
My lips shall praise Thee
Thus will I bless Thee
I lift my hands up unto Thy name

title: Trust in the Lord and don't
lyrics:
Trust in the Lord and don’t despair,
He is a Friend so true;
No matter what your troubles are,
Jesus will see you through.
Sing when the day is bright,
Sing through the darkest night,
Ev’ry day, all the way,
Let us sing, sing, sing.

title: Unto Thee, Oh Lord, do I lift
lyrics:
1.Unto Thee, Oh Lord, do I lift up my soul (2)
Oh, my God, I trust in Thee;
Let me not be ashamed,
Let not my enemies triumph over me.

2.Yea, let none that wait, wait on Thee be ashamed (2)
Oh, my God, I trust in Thee;
Let me not be ashamed,
Let not my enemies triumph over me.

3.Show me Thy ways, Thy ways, Oh Lord,
Teach me Thy paths,Thy paths, Oh Lord.
Oh, my God, I trust in Thee;
Let me not be ashamed,
Let not my enemies triumph over me.

4.Remember not the sins, the sins of my youth (2)
Oh, my God, I trust in Thee;
Let me not be ashamed,
Let not my enemies triumph over me.

title: Untold millions are still untold
lyrics:
Untold millions are still untold,
Untold millions are outside the fold,
Who will tell them of Jesus’ love,
And the heavenly mansions
Awaiting above?
(Slower)
Jesus died on calvary
To save each one from sin;
Now He calls to you and me
to go and bring them in for many,
Untold... (tempo)

title: Vaster faster than any occan
lyrics:
Vaster faster than any ocean
Deeper than the deepest sea
Is the love of Christ my Saviour
Reaching through eternity.

title: We are one in the bond of love
lyrics:
1.We are one in the bond of love (2)
We have joined our spirit
With the Spirit of the Lord, we are...

2.Let us sing now every one
Let us feel His love begun
Let us join our hands
That the world will know. We are...

title: We are one in the Spirit
lyrics:
1.We are one in the Spirit,
we are one in the Lord,     (2)
And we pray that all unity may
one day be restored:

And they’ll know we are
Christians by our love, by our love
Yes, they’ll know we are
Christians by our love

2.All praise to the Father,
from whom all things come
And all praise to Christ Jesus, His only Son,
And all praise to His Spirit
who makes us one:

title: We bring the sacrifice of praise
lyrics:
We bring the sacrifice of praise
Into the house of the Lord (2)
And we offer unto you
The sacrifices of thanksgiving
And we offer unto you
The sacrifices of joy

title: We want to see Jesus lifted high
lyrics:
1.We want to see Jesus lifted high,
A banner that flies across this land.
That all men might see the truth and know.
He is the way to heaven.

We want to see (3)
Jesus lifted high. (twice)

2.Step by step we’re moving forward
Little by little taking ground
Every prayer a powerful weapon
Strongholds come tumbling
Down and down and down and down!

title: We worship and adore thee
lyrics:
We worship and adore Thee,
Bowing down before Thee,
Songs of praises singing,
Hallelujahs ringing,
Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Amen.

title: We'll not be defeated
lyrics:
We’ll not be defeated (3) any more.
Jesus Christ God’s only Son,
Fought the battle and He won,
We’ll not be defeated, anymore.

title: We're gathered here
lyrics:
1.We’re gathered here
Because we all love Jesus
We’re in this place to glorify His Name;
Our hearts reach out to touch the Living God
Because we love the Lord We’re gathered here today.

2.We’re gathered here
To sing our songs and hymns of praise
We’re in this place to hear the Word of God;
Our minds reach out, O fill them with your thoughts, Lord,
Because we love the Lord We’re gathered here today.

title: We'll be caught up to meet him
We'll sing a new song of glorious
lyrics:
We’ll sing a new song of glorious triumph
For we see the government of God in our lives (repeat)
He is crowned God of the whole world
Crowned King of creation
Crowned ruling the nations now, Yes, He is...

title: We've a great big wonderful
lyrics:
We’ve got a great big wonderful God (2)
A God who’s always victorious,
Always watching over us
Great big wonderful God.

We’ve got a great big wonderful God (2)
A God who loves ev’ry one of us
Done so much for all of us,
Great big wonderful God.

He never, never, never leaves us,
He’s always standing by,
To pick us up if we stumble,
We’re the apple of His eye.

We’ve got a great big wonderful God (2)
Oh what a glory it is to sing
Praises to the coming King
Great big wonderful God—
A Great Big wonderful God.

title: What a mighy God we serve
lyrics:
What a mighty God we serve(2)
Angels bow before Him
Heaven and earth adore Him
What a mighty God we serve.

title: When he sees his children
lyrics:
1.When He sees His children
The work of My hands,
They shall sanctify My holy Name
They shall sanctify the Holy One of Jacob,
They shall fear the God of Israel.

They that erred in spirit,
Will come to understanding
They that murmured will learn doctrine
When He sees His children
The work of My hands,
They shall sanctify My holy Name

2.All your children shall be taught of the Lord
And great shall be their peace
When He sees His children
The work of My hands,
They shall sanctify My holy Name.

title: Where the cloud of God abides
lyrics:
Where the cloud of God abides, there will I abide;
When the cloud moves on, it’s time to go.
Where the fire burns, I want to stay;
This world chills my soul, My bones cry for God’s flame.
Oh! what security, what blissful rest
What firm assured peace is found
Neath the fiery pillar of God
When it moves I move, Where it goes I go.

title: Where the Spirit of the Lord is
lyrics:
Where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is peace;
Where the Spirit of the Lord is, There is love.
There is comfort in life’s darkest hour,
There is light and life,
There is help and power,
In the Spirit, in the Spirit of the Lord.

title: Whisper a prayer in the morning
lyrics:
Whisper a prayer in the morning
Whisper a prayer at noon
Whisper a prayer in the evening
So keep your hearts in tune

Jesus may come in the morning
Jesus may come at noon
Jesus may come in the evening,
So keep your hearts in tune

title: Why do you let the troubles of
lyrics:
Why do you let the troubles of tomorrow,
Bring sorrow to your heart and burdens too,
For if the Father’s eye is on  the sparrow,
Then surely He will care for you.
He knoweth and careth, each burden, He beareth
For if the Father’s eye is on the sparrow,
Then surely He will care for you.

title: Why worry when you can pray
lyrics:
Why worry when you can pray?
Trust Jesus He’ll be your stay:
Don’t be a “doubting Thomas”
Rest fully on His promise,
Why worry, worry, worry, worry,
When you can pray?

title: Wide, wide as the Ocean
lyrics:
Wide, wide as the Ocean,
High as the heavens above:
Deep, deep,
as the deepest sea
Is my Saviour’s love;

I, though so unworthy,
Still am a child of His care,
For His Word teaches me
That His love reaches me  ev’rywhere.

title: With Christ in the vessel we can
lyrics:
With Christ in the vessel we can
Smile at the storm, (3)
With Christ in the vessel we can smile at the storm,
As we go sailing Home.
Sailing, sailing Home, (2)
With Christ in the vessel...

title: Without faith it's impossible
lyrics:
Without faith it’s impossible, it’s impossible, it’s impossible to please God.
He who comes to God must believe that He is
And He rewards those who seek Him.
All things are possible, all things are possible, all things are possible, just believe;
God will do ev’ry thing that He says He will do, and He rewards those who seek Him.

title: Wonderful and marvellous is Jesus
lyrics:
Wonderful and marvellous is Jesus to me
Sweeter than the honey in the honey comb is He
My God is real He’ll never fail
I’ll serve Him valiantly through all eternity.

title: Wounded for me! Wounded for me
lyrics:
Wounded for me! wounded for me!
There on the cross He was wounded for me;
Gone my transgressions and now I am free,
All because Jesus was wounded for me.

title: Ye are a chosen generation
lyrics:
Ye are a chosen generation
A royal priesthood a holy nation,
A peculiar people,
To show forth the praises of Him.
Who has called you
Out of darkness (3)
Into His marvellous light. (2)

title: Yesterday, today for ever
lyrics:
Yesterday, today for ever,
Jesus is the same,
All may change, but Jesus never!
Glory to His Name (3)
All may change, but Jesus never!
Glory to His Name.

title: Yet to all who receive Him
lyrics:
Yet to all who receive Him
To those who believe in His Name
He gave them the right to become
The children of God (2)

title: You are my hiding place
lyrics:
You are my hiding place,
You always fill my heart with songs  of deliverence.
Whenever I am afraid,
I will trust in You,  (2)
Let the weak say I am strong
In the strength of the Lord.
I will trust in you..

title: You are my strenth when I am
lyrics:
1.You are my strength when I am weak
You are the treasure that I seek
You are my all in all,
Seeking You as a precious Jewel
Lord to give up I’d be a fool
You are my all in all.

Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your Name
Jesus Lamb of God
Worthy is Your Name

2.Taken my cross, my sin, my shame
Rising again, I bless Your Name
You are my all in all.
When I fall down, You pick me up
Whenever dry, You fill my cup
You are my all in all.

title: You'll always be happy
lyrics:
You’ll always be happy,
If you walk with the Lord
You’ll always be singing
If you live by His Word
You may be in trouble
Skies may not be blue
But you’ll always be happy,
If His will you do.

title: Your only Son, no sin to hide
lyrics:
1.Your only Son, no sin to hide,
But You have sent Him from Your side
To walk upon this guilty sod
And to become the Lamb of God.
